message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a unique opportunity to own a truly exceptional item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2500000.
Alice, your offer is a bit too high for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I can't afford $2500000. I'd be willing to pay $1000000 for it.  Let's see if we can work something out.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $1000000 is a significant reduction from my initial offer, but I'm still looking for a price that reflects the product's true value. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1750000.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $1750000 is still outside of my budget. I'm confident we can find a price that works for both of us. I'm willing to go up to $1250000. Let's try to close this deal.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $1500000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
Alice, I understand you're firm on this price, but I'm still not able to go that high.  I'm willing to offer $1300000. This is my final offer, let's see if we can reach an agreement.
Bob, I'm disappointed that we couldn't come to an agreement at $1500000, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1400000. This is my final offer.
